title: 166 - There’s A Serial Dumper Among Us
description: Today’s episode of the pod kicks off feel Good Friday with all the boys catching up on their latest entertainment ventures, as Connor has finally fallen deep into The Sopranos. The boys then jump right into the Po FOD, which is made up of all things around the internet and kicks off with an apparent poop bandit running around in Tony’s neighborhood, the boys give their reactions to the latest trailers that have been released including the remake of “Dune”, reactions to the most recent big foot spotting, and much much more. The episode is wrapped up by the re-emergence of Friday bangers WWE intro addition to celebrate Pat McAfee crushing it weekly on Friday Night SmackDAHN. Thank you guys for listening and don’t forget to watch full episodes of The Pod at YouTube.com/thepodpmi and send in your submissions for the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you for rocking with us, cheers.
